metadata.title: CVE-2024-2616 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memoryconditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
